duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee the monitoring of clinical trials across multiple therapeutic areas, demonstrating leadership and mentoring junior team members.
Develop and implement patient recruitment strategies at assigned sites, ensuring adherence to study timelines.
Utilize various systems and databases to manage study sites both remotely and face to face, in compliance with GCP, ICH guidelines, and local regulatory requirements.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Represent the organization in interactions with primary and other interfaces involved in clinical trials, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.
Contribute to budget development, contract negotiation, and metric/KPI governance in the clinical trial services.

education_certification.credential: B.S., R.N., or equivalent degree in Biological Sciences (Master's preferred)
